DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect electric stimulation pelvic floor function cervical cancer patient type III hysterectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Pelvic Floor Stimulation Pelvic Floor Function Cervical Cancer Patients With Type III Hysterectomy
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multi center , open , randomize , control clinical trial . All cervical carcinoma patient undergo type III hysterectomy hospital involve study recruit . 5-7 day postoperative , meet inclusion criterion without exclusion criterion sign consent randomize grouped intervention control objective 1:1 . At time , accord research hospital , menopausal status ( menopause v menopause ) surgery approach ( laparoscopic v open ) ，they stratify randomly . Patients intervention group receive electrical stimulation treatment base conventional clinical nursing , patient control group receive routine clinical care . Except treatment electrical stimulation , research procedure two group . The recovery rate urination function , pelvic floor function life quality two group compare .
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose cervical squamous cell carcinoma Ⅰa2 , Ib1 Ⅱa1 stage Type III hysterectomy There pathological result show cancer resection clean distant metastasis , Specifically follow : Lymph node ( ) ; cancer foci invasion depth < 1/2 ; Lymphatic space ( ) ; Vaginal stump ( ) ; differentiation G12 . Patients agree study , inform consent Radiotherapy chemotherapy surgery Reserved nerve surgery Urinary system damage POP ( Pelvic Organ Prolapse stage ) > II stage surgery Moderate stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) surgery ( 1 hour urine pad test > =10g ) Urinary retention surgery Severe constipation difficult defecation surgery There uncontrolled epilepsy , central nervous system disease mental disorder history patients.The clinical severity diseases Influence clinical research compliance , judge researcher .
